nodes.text: A stun blaster attachment was a lightsaber attachment that took the form of a stripped-down stun blaster attached to the saber's hilt, which allowed the lightsaber's owner to use a weapon without revealing the nature of their saber. The attachment cost 750 credits.
Stun blaster attachments were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
